title: Looking for welcoming team.
body: I main adc/support and I am available mainly weekends. I am a positive player unless people flame for no reason. If need be I can go anywhere just as so long people don't judge me to much. I am more of a carry rather then tank If I were to go top or jg. Also I have another friend whowill be happy to join as we can bot together fairly well. His name is Sucram. Thank you.
